title: The Red Star: Deluxe Edition, Volume 2
description: Christian Gossett's landmark series redefined what a comic book could look like, while the story's rich history and brutal world brought motion picture scope to the comics page. Now the massive tale is presented in deluxe form. Volume 2 collects issues #1–5 of Red Star, Vol. 2 and issues #1–3 of Sword of Lies.
author: Christian Gossett
